title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Program Using Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in science and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments with formative assessment-centered operations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core scientific theories at 90% or higher proficiency via 5-minute microlearning modules
Learners achieve a course completion rate of 85% or higher by participating in mobile-based learning at least three times weekly
Through peer collaboration assignments, learners propose three or more science problem-solving strategies applicable to practical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
